thread.title: GOT HIM: Evil ISIS mastermind behind Paris attacks obliterated by air strike
thread.title_full: GOT HIM: Evil ISIS mastermind behind Paris attacks obliterated by air strike

title: GOT HIM: Evil ISIS mastermind behind Paris attacks obliterated by air strike
text:
ISIS JUST DESSERTS: Sick Rachid Kassim has been killed in an airstrike 
Rachid Kassim was one of the group's most notorious members, believed to be responsible for masterminding a number of terror attacks throughout western Europe. 
Authorities believe Frenchman Kassim, 29, was one of the terrorists responsible for planning ISIS' disgusting attack on a Paris concert hall and throughout the city where 130 people were gunned down. 
Depraved Kassim is also believed to have recruited some of the terror group's most notorious foreign jihadis through social media. Terror attacks 2016 We take a look at the terrorist attacks of 2016. 1 / 37 REUTERS A truck crashed into a Christmas market in Berlin killing at least 12 and injuring 48 “We are currently assessing the results of the strike and will provide more information when it becomes available” Pentagon Spokesman 
Kassim brainwashed the ISIS members responsible for slaughtering a vicar in Normandy last year, and three women who failed to carry out a terror attack on Notre Dame Cathedral, Paris, in September. 
A fter 84 people were killed when a jihadi ploughed through a Bastille Day celebration in Nice, Kassim appeared in an ISIS propaganda video directly threatening French President Francois Hollande. 
But his rain of terror has come to an end after being blasted to death from a coalition airstrike in Mosul, Iraq. 
France intelligence agency DGSE has confirmed Kassim's death, after receiving intelligence from the US. 
A Pentagon spokesman said: "We are currently assessing the results of the strike and will provide more information when it becomes available." 
Coalition airstrikes are now targeting the western half of Mosul after t he eastern side of the city was liberated last month . 
GETTY LIBERATED: Families return to east Mosul ISIS's Dirty Dozen: Jihadi death cult's commanders Friday, 28th October 2016 A comprehensive compilation of the leadership of the Islamic State (IS) in pictures. 1 / 14 
Sustained attacks on ISIS strongholds have seen a number of their top commanders meet their end, with foreign jihadis fleeing like rats from a sinking ship. 
Any soldier that finds the whereabouts of the terrorist have been issued with shoot-to-kill orders. Related articles
